G

GenericTileProvider - Class in net.nologin.meep.tbv
This class is a very basic/test provider implementation and is the default provider, should the developer forget to register their own with the TiledBitmapView.
GenericTileProvider(Context) - Constructor for class net.nologin.meep.tbv.GenericTileProvider
 
getBitmapContentHash() - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.Tile
This method is used by the rendering thread to detect a change in bitmap data.
getBmpData() - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.Tile
 
getConfigGridAnchor() - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.GenericTileProvider
 
getConfigGridAnchor() - Method in interface net.nologin.meep.tbv.TileProvider
When one of the moveTo* methods in TiledBitmapView is called, the desired Tile will be moved into view.
getConfigTileIDLimits() - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.GenericTileProvider
 
getConfigTileIDLimits() - Method in interface net.nologin.meep.tbv.TileProvider
If specified, scrolling past these tile ID limits in the view will be prohibited.
getConfigTileSize() - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.GenericTileProvider
 
getConfigTileSize() - Method in interface net.nologin.meep.tbv.TileProvider
Get the side length (in px) of the square Tile objects generated by this provider.
getContext() - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.GenericTileProvider
 
getDebugSummary() - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.GenericTileProvider
 
getDebugSummary() - Method in interface net.nologin.meep.tbv.TileProvider
Generate a short summary string with the state of this provider.
getMemDebugString() - Static method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.Utils
Get some debug information about memory status, used in the information box when debug is enabled in the view.
getPosition(int, int, int) - Method in enum net.nologin.meep.tbv.GridAnchor
Calculate the x,y (or left,top in canvas speak) coordinates at which a tile would need to be drawn to match this constant.
getProvider() - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.TiledBitmapView
 
getRect(int, int) - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.Tile
Convenience method to create a Rect of this tile's size at the specified coordinates
getTile(int, int) - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.GenericTileProvider
 
getTile(int, int) - Method in interface net.nologin.meep.tbv.TileProvider
Get the specified tile.
getUpdatedSnapshot() - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.ViewState
 
getVisibleTileRange() - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.ViewState
 
GridAnchor - Enum in net.nologin.meep.tbv
When repositioning the grid to display a certain tile, this enum can be used to instruct the creation of the grid in such a way that the desired tile is located at the desired position on the view surface.
